attributes.action: hold a referendum on whether the signing of the maastricht treaty was in the best intersets of the british people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The maastricht treaty of 1992 was signed without a referendum. This has been condemned by many politicians and there should be a rethink on whether our relationship with Europe should be put back to where it was prior to Maastricht.
